item.title: Pippypippy add a quote by David Sedaris
item.description: "Hugh and I have been together for so long that in order to arouse extraordinary passion, we need to engage in physical combat. Once, he hit me on the back of the head with a broken wineglass, and I fell to the floor pretending to be unconscious. That was romantic, or would have been had he rushed to my side rather than stepping over my body to fetch the dustpan." -- David Sedaris

item.title: Pippypippy add a quote by Audrey Niffenegger
item.description: "Right now we are here, and nothing can mar our perfection, or steal the joy of this perfect moment." -- Audrey Niffenegger

item.title: Pippypippy add a quote by Ursula K. Le Guin
item.description: "My world, my Earth is a ruin. A planet spoiled by the human species. We multiplied and fought and gobbled until there was nothing left, and then we died. We controlled neither appetite nor violence; we did not adapt. We destroyed ourselves. But we destroyed the world first." -- Ursula K. Le Guin
